item.description:
After a winter hibernation Liberty Drinks Boston is back! We’re rubbing the crusties out of our eyes and coming out swingin’ out of our lair. Join us at Tia’s Thursday April 26 for our latest social hour! Your host will be Carla – so make sure to stop by and say hi!

Parking or Public Transport: Metered street parking until 8pm, near Aquarium Orange Line Stop.

When you arrive ask the hostess for Carla’s group or you can text/call her at 857.383.9015.

ABOUT LIBERTY DRINKS BOSTON (Like us!!)

 To gather liberty-loving individuals of all persuasions in the pubs, bars and restaurants of Boston and keep the conversation going.

 

https://www.boston.libertyontherocks.org/
https://www.facebook.com/liberty.drinks.boston

group.name: The Boston Area Libertarian Meetup Group
